name: Blood Blossom
description:
A hybrid top-down shooter and farming game in just 96x96 pixels!
INSTRUCTIONS: Kill zombies near the plants to water them with blood! Collect grown plants to replenish your ammo and seed to plant again.

Multiple difficulty levels, upgrades, simple swarming intelligence, and support for both keyboard and controller!

Didn't make it to the end? Watch the end cutscene here!
